interfaces

Class BankManagerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.BankManagerInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class BankManagerInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing the bank manager menu that will be displayed in the interface for bank managers to perform the required tasks: set date, create user, create account, check alerts, restock machine, undo transactions for users, shut down the system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ATM atm
      The ATM that this interface runs on.
      private GeneralInterfaceMethods general
      GeneralInterfaceMethods represents a class that contains helper methods that BankManagerInterface uses.
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      The scanner attribute that is used for the bank manager to enter inputs into the function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankManagerInterface

        public BankManagerInterface(ATM atm)
        Constructor for the BankManagerInterface.
        Parameters:
        atm - the atm that this interface runs on

    • Method Detail

      • displayManagerMenu

        public void displayManagerMenu(BankManager bm)
        The bank manager menu that the bank manager sees in the interface.
        Parameters:
        bm - the bank manager that is viewing this interface

      • printOptions

        private void printOptions()
        The options the bank manager choose to perform in the interface.

      • setDate

        private void setDate()
        The method that allows the bank manager to set the date for the ATM.

      • createUser

        private void createUser()
        Creates a new user. All account types will be automatically opened for each user when a new user is created.

      • creatingAccount

        private void creatingAccount()
        Creates a new account for a certain user. The username of the user and the type of account are inputs from the bank manager.

      • checkAlerts

        private void checkAlerts()
        Method that allows the bank manager to check alerts. The ATM will alert the bank manager every time the amount of any denomination in the ATM goes below 20. This method will read from alerts.txt because every time the amount of any denomination in the ATM goes below 20, the ATM will automatically write into alerts.txt. The bank manager will be able to check this file through this method and this is a signal for the bank manager to restock the machine.

      • restockMachine

        private void restockMachine(BankManager bm)
        Allows the bank manager to restock the machine. The bank manager will be allowed to select the type of bill to restock. The number of that type of bill the bank manager picks will increase by 100.
        Parameters:
        bm - the bank manager that is restocking the machine

      • undoTransaction

        private void undoTransaction()
        Allows the bank manager to undo all transactions, except for deposit transactions, from all types of accounts. The method will ask the bank manager which user would like to undo their transaction and ask for their account number.

      • shutDownSystem

        private void shutDownSystem()
        The method that allows bank manager to shut down the system. When the system is shut down, all data will be serialized and stored in serialized.blob.

      • writeObject

        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to store the BankManagerInterface object.
        Parameters:
        oos - instance of the ObjectOutputStream class to write the account interface object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • readObject

        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to restore the bank manager interface's information after the ATM is restarted.
        Parameters:
        ois - instance of the ObjectInputStream class used to deserialize object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • readObjectNoData

        private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Used in serialization when class inheritance is not as expected
        Throws:
        java.io.ObjectStreamException - when an attempt to deserialize a back-reference fails
